TopicTitle: Not picking up a part when I click on it?

Articles.Content:
StripSymmetry, a mod I've adopted and cleaned up a bit, does things when you click on a part. One of the things it does, but is not supposed to do, is pick up the ship.

I looked at SelectRoot's source to get inspiration, but it seems to sidestep the whole problem by saving the ship, modifying the save, then reloading again.

So, is there a way to tell KSP not to pick up a part/ship?
I would like this especially for selecting wings to make minor angle adjustments, etc.

It is a workaround, but switching to action group editing mode is the best way I know of.

Then EditorLogic.selectedParts will have the last piece clicked on, I think including any symmetrical parts.
